title: "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline"
body: I check the forums im still getting this msg. i replaced files and rewrote then still getting msg and cant log in. I also tried to repair and it will not let me "Full Client Repair Failed "

replies.body: You may want to check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Something sounds like it's blocking you from reaching the authentication server, but those steps should help open the way!
now it changed back to regular. but now i can not log in. "unable to connect to the authentication service. check the server status here if it looks good follow the guide "
